name: update
description: Updates your application and its dependencies. See https://update.angular.io/
longDescription: Before running this command, see the interactive [Angular Update Guide](https://update.angular.io/).

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: packages
options.description: The names of package(s) to update.

options.name: force
options.description: If false, will error out if installed packages are incompatible with the update.

options.name: all
options.description: Whether to update all packages in package.json.

options.name: next
options.description: Use the largest version, including beta and RCs.

options.name: migrateOnly
options.description: Only perform a migration, does not update the installed version.

options.name: from
options.description: Version from which to migrate from. Only available with a single package being updated, and only on migration only.

options.name: to
options.description: Version up to which to apply migrations. Only available with a single package being updated, and only on migrations only. Requires from to be specified. Default to the installed version detected.
